wf1260.comment: Comments: If a patient remains in a single state for too long (for example, 15 minutes) an excess wait time counter can show on Patient Tracking.

Comments: Automatically launching the Images window is enabled within the Revenue Cycle Maintenance Tool

wf35.comment: Comments: A tiny window opens below the "Confirmed" text with options for "Check In" and "No Show"

wf34.comment: Comments: DEERS retrieve occurs before opening to patient's "Future Appointments" view

Comments: "Reschedule Appointment" tab populates with a new additional drop-down field requesting "Reschedule Reason"

wf32.comment: Comments: Buttons for 3 methods for searching for an appointment change from unavailable to available (e.g. "First Available")
Comments: "First Available Times" window opens with "Suggested Results" for available appointments
Comments: Appointment details populates the "Future Appointments" list
Comments: "Schedule" window opens with a calendar of appointment slots for the requested resource(s)
Comments: "Recurring Frequencies" window opens with various search criteria -DO NOT change "Patient Duration" minutes

wf1998.comment: Comments: "Force Medical Necessity Check Against Content" option available for new Medicare patients without insurance on file

wf1993.comment: Comments: ERRA data means the current C&P exam request inventory data, data on past C&P exam requests that were cancelled and/or completed, and VHA facility capabilities (i.e., enabled/disabled DBQs based on VHA's internal personnel and resources). High level data on C&P clinic locations (names/addresses) is also included.

Comments: Products:
-ERRA tool : Determine location to send request
-Dependency on the data being available for ERRA

wf1995.comment: Comments: Complete one order at a time.

Comments: Interfaces:
-SIU_S12 : C&P Exam is scheduled : Notify VBMS that exam is scheduled (post IOC)
-SIU_S13 : C&P Exam is rescheduled : Notify VBMS that exam is rescheduled (post IOC)
-SIU_S14 : C&P Exam is modified : Notify VBMS that exam is modified (post IOC)
-SIU_S15 : C&P Exam is cancelled : Notify VBMS that exam is cancelled (post IOC)

Comments: Interfaces:
-ORM : VHA Creates Child Orders : VHA Creates Child Order to map to original request (post IOC)
